title: Regulation (EEC) No 1460/73 of the Commission of 16 May 1973 on applications for reimbursement of aid granted by Member States of recognized groups of hop producers
header:
REGULATION (EEC) No 1460/73 OF THE COMMISSION  of 16 May 1973  on applications for reimbursement of aid granted by Member States to recognized groups of hop producers
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. Applications for reimbursement made by Member States as provided in Article 17 (4) of Regulation (EEC) No 1696/71 shall be submitted in accordance with the Tables set out in Annex I to this Regulation.
2. The information set out in Annex II to this Regulation shall be provided in respect of each recognized producer group so that the Commission may decide on the initial reimbursement of aid granted to those groups.

Each Member State shall hold for inspection by the Commission for a period of two years from the date of the applications for reimbursement the supporting documents in its possession - or certified copies thereof - on the basis of which the aid provided for in Articles 8 and 9 of Regulation (EEC) No 1696/71 was calculated.  (1)OJ No L 175, 4.8.1971, p. 1. (2)OJ No L 86, 31.3.1973, p. 26.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
